revised_title: Statistical Mechanics of Cooperative Assemblies: Regular Solutions and Quasi-Chemical Equilibria
tldr: The authors develop a statistical mechanical approach to study regular assemblies, a class of cooperative assemblies with specific properties. They construct the grand partition function and derive expressions for average properties, such as the fraction of sites occupied and the probability of a given site being occupied. They also introduce quasi-chemical equilibrium relations to analyze the problem and determine the free energy of the assembly.
